title.value: Analysis of complex soil wind erosion characteristics of Polesye [Belarus]
Анализ комплексных характеристик дефляции почв Полесья [Беларусь]

journal.title: Soil Science and Agrochemistry : scientific journal

person.name: Likhatsevich, N.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Soil Science and Agrochemistry

abstract.value: In course of the research there was analyzed the complex characteristics of soil wind erosion in the conditions of the Polesje region of the Republic of Belarus. The joint analysis of 'soil blowing null model' reference positions by V.M. Gendugov and G.P. Glazunov and conclusions derived on the basis of developed by us wind erosion 'power' model confirmed their identical effectiveness in the post critical range of wind velocities. Application of threshold, initial quadratic and critical velocities introduced by Institute for Soil Science and Agrochemistry of National Academy of Sciences of Belarus in wind erosion power model make it possible to widen its scope, determining complex wind erosion parameters and soil blowing intensity in the under critical range of wind velocities. The exponential wind erosion model effect by V.M. Gendugov and G.P. Glazunov do not spread out this range. Has shown, that the ratio of critical speed (for given soil) to factual wind velocity, laid down in the ground of 'soil blowing null model' by V.M. Gendugov and G.P. Glazunov, is similar to receive by Institute for Soil Science and Agrochemistry soil resistance of wind exposure parameter (SRW).
